Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Adorable \A*dor"a*ble\, a. [L. adorabilis, fr. adorare: cf. F. adorable.] 1. Deserving to be adored; worthy of divine honors. [1913 Webster]
The adorable Author of Christianity. --Cheyne. [1913 Webster]
2. Worthy of the utmost love or respect. [1913 Webster]
adorable adj : lovable especially in a childlike or naive way [syn: {endearing}, {lovely}]
